lines.text: A pig that doesn't fly is just a pig.
I'd rather be a pig than a fascist.
If you make money from war, you're scum. If you can't make money from bounty hunting, you're an idiot!

[taunting Porco]
If you run away, I'll tell everyone you're chicken!
I'm a pig. I don't fight for honor. I fight for a paycheck.
So we're taking all 15 of them?
Well it wouldn't be nice to seperate them from their friends.
There are warrants out on you for treason, illegal entry, decadence, pornography... and for being a lazy pig.

[Curtis and Porco have run out of ammo when Curtis attempts to shoot Porco with a revolver]
Hahaha... This isn't a Western, you can't hit me from here.
He said "Cute kid. When did you start babysitting?"
